explains: n. 参议员，（古罗马的）元老院议员，（大学理事会的）理事；<苏格兰>庭长

sentences.en: She openly flaunted her affair with the senator.
sentences.cn: 她公开夸耀与参议员的恋情。

sentences.en: The senator was invited but was unable to attend.
sentences.cn: 参议员受到了邀请，但是未能出席。

sentences.en: The senator was accused of waffling on major issues.
sentences.cn: 人们指责参议员在主要问题上立场模糊。
